mapper.insert: INSERT INTO BBS VALUES( SEQ_BBS.nextval, #{id}, (SELECT NVL(MAX(REF), 0)+1 FROM BBS), (SELECT NVL(MAX(STEP), 0)+1 FROM BBS), 0, #{title}, #{content}, SYSDATE ,1 ,0)
mapper.update: UPDATE BBS SET STEP = STEP + 1 WHERE REF=(SELECT REF FROM BBS WHERE SEQ=#{seq}) AND STEP > (SELECT REF FROM BBS WHERE SEQ=#{seq})
